You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &oopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Oopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D546.
  * `&oopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D560.
